Class EnquiryController

java.lang.Object
Enquiry.EnquiryController
public class EnquiryController extends Object
The EnquiryController class handles logic for managing enquiries. It supports adding, deleting, updating, and filtering enquiries based on project ownership, applicant NRIC, and enquiry status.

  • Method Details

    • getAllEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries from the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all Enquiry objects

    • addEnquiry

      public static void addEnquiry(LocalDate today, String projectName, String nric, String message)
      Creates and stores a new enquiry for a specific project and applicant.
      Parameters:
      today - the current date of enquiry submission
      projectName - the name of the project the enquiry is about
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      message - the enquiry message content

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      a list of Enquiry objects submitted by the applicant

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Deletes an enquiry by its ID if it exists.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the ID of the enquiry to be deleted

    • getEnquiryById

      public static Enquiry getEnquiryById(String enquiryId)
      Retrieves an enquiry by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the enquiry ID
      Returns:
      the corresponding Enquiry object, or null if not found

    • updateEnquiry

      public static void updateEnquiry(Enquiry e)
      Updates an existing enquiry in the repository.
      Parameters:
      e - the enquiry object with updated fields

    • getUnrepliedEnquiriesByProjects

      public static List<Enquiry> getUnrepliedEnquiriesByProjects(String managerId)
      Retrieves all unreplied enquiries for projects managed by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      managerId - the ID of the manager
      Returns:
      a list of unreplied enquiries for the manager's projects

    • getEnquiriesForHandledProject

      public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesForHandledProject(String id)
      Retrieves all unreplied enquiries for projects handled by the given officer.
      Parameters:
      id - the officer ID
      Returns:
      a list of unreplied enquiries for the officer's handled projects

    • getAllEnquiriesForHandledProjects

      public static List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiriesForHandledProjects(String officerId)
      Retrieves all enquiries (replied and unreplied) for projects handled by the officer.
      Parameters:
      officerId - the ID of the officer
      Returns:
      a list of all enquiries associated with the officer's projects
